alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Lee; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:08PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Chickasaw, southeastern Lee and northwestern Monroe Counties through 945 PM CST... At 908 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trebloc, or 7 miles northeast of Montpelier, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Okolona, Shannon, Plantersville, New Wren, Trebloc, Nettleton, Sparta, Egypt, Wren, McCondy, Bigbee, Leotis and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
